text: Ajith Premakumara Millagaha Gedara (born 12 October 1991) is a sprinter from Sri Lanka who specialises in the 400 m distance. He won silver medals in the 4 × 400 m relay at the 2016 South Asian Games and 2017 Asian Championships; his team placed fourth at the 2018 Asian Games. ==References== Category:Sri Lankan male sprinters Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Asian Games Category:South Asian Games silver medalists for Sri Lanka Category:Asian Games competitors for Sri Lanka Category:South Asian Games medalists in athletics
title: Ajith Premakumara
